name: Demon Inside
description:
Check out the Developer Log below to see a comprehensive look at the development behind this game!

This game was created by Rob Davis, Ethan Ngo, Gabriel Waegner, John Satkowski, and Rowan McCormick as the final project for our first game design course.

How To Play Demon Inside

Basic Controls:

W - UP

S - DOWN

A - LEFT

D - RIGHT

Use Mouse To Aim, Left Click To Fire

Developer/Grader Tools:

To test functionality, Space will destroy all enemies in a room, opening the door to the next.

For demonstration purposes, P will instantly give the player 50 souls.

Game Objective and Game Mechanics:

After taking damage, the player is invincible for 90 frames.

Your goal is to defeat as many enemies as you can on your way to defeating the boss.

At first, this will prove to be quite challenging.

Enemies that you manage to defeat will drop their souls. Run over these souls to collect them.

When you die, you can spend your souls to upgrade either health, speed, damage, or fire rate.

Along your journey, you may find Altars. These altars will change how your gun functions and can stack on top of one another.

Try all the combinations! What is a spread shot mixed with a crossbow? How about a flamethrower mixed with a machine gun?

Be careful though: when you die, your gun is reset to its normal form.

Some altars will have enemies near them- these altars have become corrupted, and will not give the player an upgrade.

Have fun, and see what kind of power-ups and builds combine the best!
